Coding challenge

Progression

Going to the gym is a passion of mine because challenging myself every week with more reps or adding weight and seeing my progress gives me joy. For someone looking to start their journey at the gym give:

  • Progressive overload a go
  • Be consistent!
  • More steps

workout split

I do currently do push,pull,legs split twice a week and suggest for beginners or even someone returning to the gym to find a program and be consistent.

nutrition

I have recently figured out I need to fuel my body with even more protein but also carbs, fibre and healthy fats. For someone looking to change their nutrition based on their goal, I would recommend:

  1. Finding out their activity level speaking to a health professional about making changes.
  2. Having more or less calories while getting the right amount of protein, carb, fats and fibre.
